data.title: Park City, Summit and Wasatch County Government
data.meta_description: View links for Park City's government agency websites from Summit County and Wasatch County in northern Utah. Contact local Park City Realtors.
data.text:
Park City, Utah - Government Agencies

The city of Park City is located in Summit County, Utah which also includes nearby Kamas and Oakley. Neighboring Heber and Midway are located in Wasatch County. Below are links to the Park City area government websites. Often in your Park City real estate search you might need to use these resources to get further information. If there is something in particular you are looking for, such as the building department, planning, tax assesor, etc., give us a call, we might be able to point you in the right direction. As local Park City Realtors, you can count on us to help you track down any information you need. We may not always be the source of the information you seek, but we sure will be the source of the source!

Park City Municipal Website

This is the city's goverment website. When buying real estate in Park City, you might need more information from the building department, planning department, engineering, zoning, municipal codes, business licenses, chamber of commerce, etc. The website is also a good starting point for questions regarding historic homes.

www.parkcity.org

Quick Link to Park City's Zoning Map:

http://parkcity.maps.arcgis.com/home/webmap/viewer.html

Quick Link to Park City's Historic Homes Inventory:

http://www.parkcity.org/index.aspx?page=139

Quick Link to Park City's Historic Design Guidelines:

http://www.parkcity.org/departments/community-development-affordable-housing-building-engineering-planning/planning/historic-district-design-guideline-revisions

Summit County Website

This site is for the county that governs Park City, Deer Valley, and The Canyons areas. Also includes Kamas, Peoa, Oakley, Coalville, Francis, and Woodland. Your real estate search may require inquiries into Summit County planning, zoning, county tax assessments, county clerk, and public records.

www.co.summit.ut.us

Wasatch County Website

This site is for the county that governs Heber Valley and Midway. Your property search may require inquiries into Wasatch County planning, zoning, county tax assessments, county clerk, and public records.

www.co.wasatch.ut.us

State of Utah Website

The official website for the state of Utah. This will also have information for things like Driver License, Jobs, Business, Birth Certificates, Hunting and Fishing Licenses, Vehicle Renewal, Visiting Utah, Travel, etc. If you are buying a home in Park City this will be a resourceful link for you.

www.utah.gov

Licensee Lookup & Verification System

Need to lookup a General Contractor, Plumber, Electrician, or Builder? This link is for the Lincesee Lookup database for Utah. If you want to verify a person's license status, this is where you can do so. https://secure.utah.gov/llv/search/index.html

Utah Department of Commerce - Division of Real Estate

You can verify our Associate Brokers licenses here. The mission of the Utah Division of Real Estate is to protect the public and promote responsible business practices through education, licensure, and regulation of real estate, mortgage, and appraisal professionals.

http://realestate.utah.gov/
